org.hps.online.recon

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.online.recon.Command
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateCommand, ListCommand, LoadCommand, LogCommand, RemoveCommand, SaveCommand, SetCommand, ShutdownCommand, StartCommand, StatusCommand, StopCommand

    public abstract class Command
extends Object
    Command for the online reconstruction server Commands are sent as JSON containing the name of the command and a map of parameters.
